verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3947"\w* Aaron’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* fire \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w added|strong="H5414"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w unauthorized|strong="H2114"\w* \f + \fr 10:1 \ft Or strange\f* fire \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w contrary|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* fire \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* consumed \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron, “\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w meant|strong="H1696"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*: ‘\w To|strong="H1696"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H6942"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w holiness|strong="H6942"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* reveal \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3513"\w*.’” \w But|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron remained \w silent|strong="H1826"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Elzaphan,\f + \fr 10:4 \ft Elzaphan is a variant of Elizaphan; see Numbers 3:30.\f* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron’s \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H7126"\w* here; \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* bodies \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* cousins \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5375"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w came|strong="H7126"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H7126"\w*, still \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w tunics|strong="H3801"\w*, \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w as|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w directed|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar, “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hair|strong="H7218"\w* \w become|strong="H7107"\w* disheveled \f + \fr 10:6 \ft Or Do not uncover your heads\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tear|strong="H6533"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* garments, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w else|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w mourn|strong="H1058"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fire|strong="H8316"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* ignited.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w outside|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1697"\w*. Restrictions for Priests
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron,

“\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* enter \w the|strong="H4191"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w else|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; \w this|strong="H4191"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H2708"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* come.

You must distinguish between \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w and|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w common|strong="H2455"\w*, between \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w and|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*,

\w so|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w remains|strong="H3498"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w without|strong="H3588"\w* \w leaven|strong="H4682"\w* beside \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* share \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*’ share \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w thigh|strong="H7785"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w contribution|strong="H8641"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* these \w portions|strong="H2706"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* been \w assigned|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H2706"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w thigh|strong="H7785"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w contribution|strong="H8641"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*, \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w portions|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* fire, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w permanently|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.”

Later, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w searched|strong="H1875"\w* \w carefully|strong="H1875"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* been \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*. \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar, Aaron’s \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w asked|strong="H1875"\w*,

“\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* didn’t \w you|strong="H3588"\w* eat \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*; \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w making|strong="H5414"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Since|strong="H2005"\w* \w its|strong="H3808"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* brought \w inside|strong="H6441"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w*, \w you|strong="H6680"\w* should \w have|strong="H3808"\w* eaten \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* area, \w as|strong="H6680"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron \w replied|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w this|strong="H1696"\w* \w very|strong="H3190"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w presented|strong="H7126"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Since|strong="H3117"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* things \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w happened|strong="H7122"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w if|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* eaten \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w acceptable|strong="H3190"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w* explanation, \w he|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H3190"\w*.
